hero.title: Deliver Your Furniture to Your Customers' Homes Virtually
hero.description: Let your customers experience all the furniture in your product range in their homes, with various size, color, and texture options, through their smartphones and buy with confidence.

product.title: Increase Your Sales With 'See At Home' Technology
product.description: By offering your customers 'See at Home' technology, you can make it easy for them to find the right furniture for their floors and curtains. This technology allows them to choose from thousands of options without architectural consulting.
product.arNotSupported: AR viewing is only available on compatible mobile devices

about.title: Meet Our Team
about.description: We are a dedicated team of professionals committed to revolutionizing the furniture shopping experience through innovative AR technology.
about.person1Description: 3D Software Engineer, specializing in creating realistic 3D models of furniture.
about.person2Description: Business Development Manager, specializing in forming partnerships with furniture manufacturers.

footer.description: Experience the future of carpet shopping with our augmented reality technology. Try before you buy, right in your own space.
